EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-12-11-Field-Central-ESB-Chicago.ES-2017-12-04-Chicago-1.EMAIL - Marketi
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Chicago Executive Networking Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/learn-chicago]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on December 11th, as the Chicago Bulls take on the Boston Celtics. We're expecting a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, basketball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry.
Executive Reception followed by <[[turbonomic.com/learn-chicago]]> *Chicago Bulls vs Boston Celtics <[[turbonomic.com/learn-chicago]]>
Where: United Center, Chicago IL Monday, December 11th 4:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-chicago]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
*Must attend reception for admittance to the game
